description: A great cross-country tight is as versatile as it is essential. Elegantly designed with brushed fabric to keep you warm and dry, a zippered calf to step simply in and out of boots and a zippered pocket to stow small items securely, this is a perfect tight when you want to push the pace and dig deep. For big efforts when performance is paramount.
name: Odlo Ceramiwarm Tights - Mens
